items.summary: Create a predefined label list based on the uploaded image and make it available to the frontend as a single source of truth. The label list must include: Colorart, Vintage, Hermosa, Rurban, Essentials, Eternal Treasure, Hues, Inhouse, Cotsmere, Little Maspar, Generic, Maspar.

Update the Admin Upload form so admins can select from the predefined labels instead of typing label text manually. Keep bilingual label support: selecting a predefined label should populate the English label field, and the Hindi label field must remain editable so admins can enter/override Hindi when needed.
